Analyze your data with ![](/images/galaxy_logo_25percent_transparent.png){height="1em"} and the ![](/images/W4M_icon.svg){height="1em"} infrastructure!

The Workflow4Experimenters 2026 session (![](/images/W4E_icon.svg){height="1em"}2026) took place in April 2026. During this one-week course (entirely in English), participants have learned how to use the ![](/images/W4M_icon.svg){height="1em"} infrastructure and analyze their own LC-MS, GC-MS, or NMR data.

For this new session, format changed:

-   From 30 March to 3rd April: online theoretical sessions (methods and tools). This session is *only accessible to person who will be present in Rouen for the onsite session.*
-   From April, 20th to 24th: tutoring on your own data, PBS Laboratory Rouen (Rouen University, Campus de Mont Saint-Aignan, France, close to Paris).

::: callout-important
The pre-registration for the school is now open ! Deadline extension until 31/01/2026 [Follow the link to pre-register](https://sondages.inrae.fr/index.php/576765?lang=fr).
:::

**Costs**: 1300€ for academic and 2500 € for private institution (to cover expenses for trainers, organization, materials and meals). A special discount of 100€ is offered for [RFMF](https://www.rfmf.fr/) members 2025.
